name: Rotational Golf
description:
Short golf game where your objective is to rotate the objects in the right direction so the ball can successfully get in the hole.

This game was made for the Kenney Game Jam but because I didn't finish it in time I decided to add couple of more things and release it. 

!!!Play in full screen for better experience!!!

Controls can be find in game

Made by : viksa 

Assets by : Kenney
